thread.title: Prabhas Failed - Vijay Deverakonda Next...

author: G GOWTHAM
title: Prabhas Failed - Vijay Deverakonda Next...
text:
amitabhBachchan's portrayal of Aswaththama was the real star, even though
prabhasplayed the protagonist. The sheer generosity of Bachchan's on-screen persona and distinctive baritone was too much for even
prabhasto surpass.
According to recent speculations,
amitabh bachchanmay appear in
rahulSankrityan's future film, which is directed by Vijay Deverakonda.
rayalaseemain the 1850s serves as the setting for the film, which promises an engaging plot. Big B and
vijay deverakondatogether in a
movieseems like such an amazing prospect. It may make for a great
movieif there are face-off moments between the two. But as seen in
kalki2898 AD, Bachchan's dominant presence might eclipse VD.
We need to see if VD is willing to take the chance of seeing another actor's histrionics shine in a movie. However, Big B's involvement in the project, which is now known as VD14, has not been formally verified, thus they are merely rumors.
Due to the reunion of
vijay deverakondaand
rahul sankrityanfollowing their successful film Taxiwaala, the project has already attracted a lot of attention. Expectations are high because it is being produced by Mythri
movieMakers. The fact that Adipurush star Ajay-Atul has been enlisted to write the soundtrack further heightens the anticipation. Arnold Vosloo, actor of The Mummy, has also been confirmed to play a significant part, while renowned cinematographer Ã‰ric Gautier, who has worked on movies like Into the Wild and The Motorcycle Diaries, has joined as
directorof photography.
